sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row class="d-flex justify-center">
      <v-col
        md="4"
        sm="8"
        xs="12"
        :class="{
          'px-7 py-4': $vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
          'py-1': $vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
        }"
      >
        <v-form>
          <o-text
            sm
            semi-bold
            class="mb-3"
          >
            {{ ONE_MORE_THING }}
          </o-text>
          <header-title class="pb-4">
            {{ EMAIL_TITLE }}
          </header-title>
          <o-text-field
            :title="EMAIL_TEXT_FIELD_TITLE"
            id="email"
            @onChange="onChange($event)"
            @onKeyEnter="onNextClicked"
            @onPaste="onPaste($event)"
            :placeholder="EMAIL"
          />
          <action-button
            @click="onNextClicked"
            :class="{
              'mt-n3': $vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
              'mt-n2': $vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
            }"
            :disabled="isDisabled"
            :loading="isLoading"
            primary-color
            block
            x-large
          >
            {{ NEXT_BUTTON }}
          </action-button>
        </v-form>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex'
import OTextField from '@/components/molecules/OTextField.vue'
import ActionButton from '@/components/atoms/ActionButton.vue'
import { EMAIL_LOOKUP } from 'branding/strings.json'
import OText from '@/components/atoms/OText.vue'
import HeaderTitle from '@/components/molecules/HeaderTitle.vue'
import { setGiftEmail, setIsGift } from '@/store/sessionStorage.js'
import { validateEmail, validateOrderId } from '@/utils'

export default {
  components: {
    OTextField,
    ActionButton,
    OText,
    HeaderTitle
  },
  data () {
    return {
      email: '',
      isDisabled: true,
      ONE_MORE_THING: EMAIL_LOOKUP.ONE_MORE_THING,
      EMAIL_TITLE: EMAIL_LOOKUP.EMAIL_TITLE,
      EMAIL_TEXT_FIELD_TITLE: EMAIL_LOOKUP.EMAIL_TEXT_FIELD_TITLE,
      EMAIL: EMAIL_LOOKUP.EMAIL,
      NEXT_BUTTON: EMAIL_LOOKUP.NEXT_BUTTON
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters({
      order: 'order/order',
      isLoading: 'order/isLoading',
      state_orderId: 'ui/orderId',
      state_Email: 'ui/email'
    })
  },
  mounted () {
    setIsGift(true)
    this.email = ''
    document.title = this.EMAIL_TEXT_FIELD_TITLE
    this.validate()
  },
  methods: {
    onChange (event) {
      this.validate(event.target.value)
    },
    onPaste (event) {
      this.validate(event.clipboardData.getData('text/plain'))
    },
    validate (value) {
      this.email = value
      this.isDisabled = !validateEmail(value)
    },
    async onNextClicked () {
      if (this.isDisabled) {
        return
      }
      setGiftEmail(this.email)
      if (this.state_orderId && validateOrderId(this.state_orderId)) {
        this.$router.push('/zipcode')
      } else {
        this.$router.push('/order')
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.container {
  padding-top: 60px;
}
</style>
